snippet: The mayor-elect made two solid appointments: Anthony Shorris as first deputy mayor and William Bratton as New York police commissioner.
abstract: Editorial praises New York City Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio for his appointments of Anthony Shorris as deputy mayor and William Bratton as police commissioner; contends both are familiar, seasoned veterans that will help de Blasio manage city government.
lead_paragraph: The mayor-elect made two solid appointments: Anthony Shorris as first deputy mayor and William Bratton as New York police commissioner.

headline.main: The de Blasio Team Takes Shape
headline.print_headline: The de Blasio Team Takes Shape
